rules.natural: If the show is funded, then the show is published
Either the show is funded or the show is documented
Whenever the show is documented, it follows that if the substance is approved, then should the substance be effective, fertilization of the plant leads to maturity of the plant
If the plant is mature, then it is not the case that the show harvested the plant
If the substance is tested, then the substance is effective
Should the substance be contaminated, the substance is unsafe
Provided that the substance is applied to the plant, it follows that if the substance is effective, then fertilization of the plant leads to maturity of the plant
Either the substance is applied to the plant or the substance is analyzed
If the substance is analyzed, then the substance is approved
If it is not the case that testing the substance implies fertilization leads to maturity, then the substance is contaminated
Whenever the show is not successful, the show harvested the plant
Should the show not be successful, the plant was fertilized

facts.natural: It is not the case that the show was published

steps.natural: Under the condition that the substance is tested, if the plant is fertilized, then the plant becomes mature
Provided that the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature
Provided that the show is not successful, the plant is mature
Under the condition that the show is not successful, it is not the case that the show harvested the plant
Either the show is published, or under the condition that the substance is approved, it follows that if the substance is effective, then whenever the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature
Provided that the substance is approved, it follows that if the substance is effective, then whenever the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature
Under the condition that the substance is analyzed, if the substance is effective, then fertilization of the plant results in maturity of the plant
Whenever the substance is effective, fertilization of the plant results in maturity of the plant
Under the condition that the substance is tested, if the plant is fertilized, then the plant becomes mature
Provided that the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature
Provided that the show is not successful, the plant is mature
Under the condition that the show is not successful, it is not the case that the show harvested the plant

natural_facts.A8: The substance was applied to the plant

(A10 → (A7 → (A3 → A2))).natural: Provided that the substance is approved, it follows that if the substance is effective, then whenever the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature

(A11 ∨ (A10 → (A7 → (A3 → A2)))).natural: Either the show is published, or under the condition that the substance is approved, it follows that if the substance is effective, then whenever the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature

(A12 → A11).natural: If the show is funded, then the show is published

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: Either the show is funded or the show is documented

(A13 → (A10 → (A7 → (A3 → A2)))).natural: Whenever the show is documented, it follows that if the substance is approved, then should the substance be effective, fertilization of the plant leads to maturity of the plant

(A2 → ¬A1).natural: If the plant is mature, then it is not the case that the show harvested the plant

(A3 → A2).natural: Provided that the plant is fertilized, the plant becomes mature

(A4 → (A3 → A2)).natural: Under the condition that the substance is tested, if the plant is fertilized, then the plant becomes mature

(A4 → A7).natural: If the substance is tested, then the substance is effective

(A5 → A6).natural: Should the substance be contaminated, the substance is unsafe

(A7 → (A3 → A2)).natural: Whenever the substance is effective, fertilization of the plant results in maturity of the plant

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the substance is applied to the plant or the substance is analyzed

(A9 → (A7 → (A3 → A2))).natural: Under the condition that the substance is analyzed, if the substance is effective, then fertilization of the plant results in maturity of the plant

(A9 → A10).natural: If the substance is analyzed, then the substance is approved

(¬(A4 → (A3 → A2)) → A5).natural: If it is not the case that testing the substance implies fertilization leads to maturity, then the substance is contaminated

(¬G → A1).natural: Whenever the show is not successful, the show harvested the plant
